ovdesc.p: This application contains various details of the tape being processed. It is updated for both incoming and outgoing tapes.
For outgoing tapes it is updated when the GENERATE or REGEN action is performed and for incoming tapes it is updated when the LOAD action is performed.
These details are deleted once the transaction details for the tape are physically downloaded or uploaded and written to the FT.TAPE.HIST file.
